Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Our Bangkok 5-star hotel rooms are expressive, yet functional, and adorned with warm, vibrant colors

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: The rooms are artfully balanced with just the right amenities for both business and leisure guests.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Unique among Bangkok luxury hotels, we offer Revive bedding with designer duvets and plush pillows.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Enjoy individually controlled air conditioning, mini-bars, in-room safes and 42-inch LCD TVs.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: High-speed Internet, Jack Pack plug-and-play systems and gadget connectivity increase productivity.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: This 5-star hotel in Bangkok features picturesque views of the magnificent skyline and cityscape.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Our Bangkok 5-star hotel rooms are expressive, yet functional, and adorned with warm, vibrant colors
The rooms are artfully balanced with just the right amenities for both business and leisure guests.
Unique among Bangkok luxury hotels, we offer Revive bedding with designer duvets and plush pillows.
Enjoy individually controlled air conditioning, mini-bars, in-room safes and 42-inch LCD TVs.
High-speed Internet, Jack Pack plug-and-play systems and gadget connectivity increase productivity.
This 5-star hotel in Bangkok features picturesque views of the magnificent skyline and cityscape.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: We are ideally located in the premier Sukhumvit area of Bangkok, Thailand, near attractions.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: This convenient Bangkok Thonglor hotel is a two-minute walk from the nearest BTS skytrain station.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Our Thonglor hotel is in the vicinity of major attractions, such as malls and community complexes.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: We are a five-star luxury hotel in Sukhumvit situated within a two-minute walk from BTS Thonglor skytrain.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Enjoy six innovative meeting rooms designed to inspire productivity with Wi-Fi and the latest in audiovisual technology.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Octave Rooftop Bar and Lounge is ideal for light, Asian-style tapas, classic cocktails and sweeping views of the city on our rooftop.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The Bangkok Marriott Sukhumvit offers guestrooms and suites on the highest floors, commanding stunning views of the city. Choose from a variety of restaurants, trendy outdoor roof top bar and lounges for great dining in Thailand.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: At Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit, the top Marriott hotel Bangkok has to offer, you will discover a stunning, desirable location just a two-minute walk from Thonglor BTS (Sukhumvit Line). This luxury, five-star hotel is in close proximity to art and design galleries, nightclubs and vibrant entertainment. For shopping, choose to wander around the nearby shopping malls, or alternatively explore the chic, funky outlets and boutique shops of local Thai designers. This hotel offers a state-of-the-art health club and rejuvenating spa, along with delectable dining options. With its stylish rooftop bar, this stunning hotel serves top-notch, handcrafted cocktails among breathtaking city views. As one of the most ideal Marriott hotels in Bangkok for innovative meetings or extraordinary functions in Thailandâ€™s capital, the hotel offers nearly 5,000 square feet of space for a truly memorable event experience. Discover sophisticated luxury at Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: This luxury 5 star Hotel is conveniently located near Thonglor and easily accessible from the BTS skytrain station which is a 2-minute walking distance from the hotel.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our Bangkok meeting facilities offer six spectacular venues totaling more than 1,000 square meters.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Totaling 462 square meters, our largest Bangkok meeting space is the exquisite Grand Ballroom.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Stay connected with high-speed Wi-Fi and wired Internet access.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: We provide the latest in audiovisual equipment and state-of-the-art meeting facilities and service.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Enjoy a full-service business center with copy machines, printing, fax and secretarial assistance.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Innovative meeting menus are enhanced by exceptional service at our Bangkok business hotel.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Creative services at our Bangkok wedding venue ensure memorable social events and theme parties.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: The largest of our wedding venues, Bangkok Grand Ballroom totals 462 square meters of chic space.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Banquet halls feature modern technology, audiovisual equipment and projectors for presentations.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Innovative theme weddings and events are smoothly coordinated by our wedding planning team.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Collaborate with our onsite professionals for flawless service and larger-than-life celebrations.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: In addition to elegant Bangkok wedding venues, we offer delectable cuisine crafted by our chefs.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Bright, bold and upbeat, this modern, all-day dining restaurant embodies the soul of home-style cooking. Distinct among Bangkok restaurants, 57th Street is conveniently located just steps from your guest room and is the perfect place to relax and unwind.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Guests looking for a Bangkok steakhouse experience unlike any other can look no further than The District, a tasty restaurant serving the finest cuts of meat in a stunning ambiance. Make a reservation and enjoy one of the top dining options in the city.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: As the premier rooftop bar Bangkok has to offer, Octave Bar and Lounge provides unforgettable city views and a relaxing ambiance. This cool, timeless bar and terrace situated on the top floor of the hotel offers a tasty dinner menu and cocktails.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: As an indulgent destination unlike other cafÃ©'s in Bangkok, Chocolate Cake Company offers sinful desserts sure to satisfy any sweet tooth. Chocolate Cake Company specializes in grab-and-go gourmet coffee and decadent pastries, baked fresh daily.

Description.Name: Additional Oversold Policy
Description.Text: Equal standard hotel and room category, within the same price range.

Brief Description of Local Entertainment
Description.Text: Cineplex offering the latest movies and films located on sukhumvit Soi 61, Watthana.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From the passenger terminal, use Northern Access to an eight-lane elevated road link - Bangkok-Chon Buri Highway (Motor Way) following Rama 9 Road sign and take exit at Rama 9. Turn left to Asoke-Montri road, turn left at Asoke intersection towards Sukhumvit road. Taking 2.5 miles and the hotel is on the left.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The largest indoor play and family entertainment area in Bangkok.

Description.Name: Spa marketing description
Description.Text: In an elegant, soft, and cozy atmosphere, the Anne Semonin Spa offers a privileged area dedicated to beauty and well-being.

Towels Provided Provide for Guest at Outdoor Swimming Pool
Full Day Rate description
Description.Text: Includes two coffee breaks, buffet lunch, standard conference stationary and audio visual equipment.

Description.Name: Half Day Rate description
Description.Text: Includes one coffee break, buffet lunch, standard conference stationary and audio visual equipment.

TPA_Ext_eConfo.Title: Rise up as the Sun sets at Octave Rooftop Lounge & Bar

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Sundowner Deal: from 5 - 7 pm. Buy one get one free on signature cocktails.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: Our innovative and inviting meeting rooms are designed to inspire productivity and dedicated conference service personnel are on hand to support it, as are wi-fi and state of the art AV technology.The Grand Ballroom is an impressive venue for conferences and talk of the town galas. The hotel has more than 10,000 sq ft of meting space including a Ball room and 5 other breakout venues.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Ideal fo small to medium sized groups upto 100 peak nights. Key business segments are corprate group and FIT. Breakout rooms and Ballroom foyer have natural daylight. Ballroom seats 250 in rounds and 400 in theatre style. Located in an upscale residential area yet easily accessible from all major roads and highways. Walking distance from BTS sky train station.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Location - located in the upscale residential neighborhood of Thonglor, the hotel is easily accesible from major roads and higways. The BTS skytrain station is merely a two minute walk from the hotel.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Food and beverage - the hotel features several dining options for the international traveler. 57th Street - all day dining is renowned for it home style cooking while the District Grill room and Bar serves the finest meat and seafood specialties.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Octave Roof top Lounge and Bar - A multi level bar with a private room and roof top lounge located on the 49th flloor. Expect modern asian cuisine, wines and classic cocktails accompanied by music from local and international DJ talent.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Oct - Mid December - High season for Corporate FIT and Groups. Mid December - February - High season for leisure market. Corporate group demand picks up mid January onward. This period experiences peak demand in terms of local catering and weddings.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Oct - Mid December - High season for Corporate FIT and Groups. Mid December - February- High season for leisure market. This period experiences peak demand in terms of local catering and weddings.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: April - several public holidays due to Songkran Festival. Corporate FIT and group business dips. Gradually starts picking up in May.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: School holidays in key Asian market leads to improve demand in leisure segment. Also peak demand from Middle East market post Ramadan. Corporate business is back with good opportunity in Group segment.
